A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: TLJ showed a more realistic perspective of the galaxy far\, far away than previous episodes have - and I believe that's a good thing. Everyone fails at times. Heroes\, villains\, celebrities\, nobodies\, everyone experiences failure throughout life and it messes with the \n\"plan.\" I think this beautiful mess made for a fun and exciting chapter in the saga. \nWas it perfect? Hell no\, but neither was ANH or even ESB. Enjoy this movie for what it is - don't dwell in what it isn't.
